main.name: Dallin Romney
main.bio: Hi, I'm Dallin, welcome to my online portfolio. I enjoy creating, exploring, and connecting. Career experience is in manufacturing engineering and sales, but passion has shifted towards software development, especially web3. Offline you'll spot me with a book, a guitar, or a tennis racquet.

work.title: Manufacturing Engineer
work.description: Oversee daily operations for medical device manufacturing lines. Execute and manage interdisciplinary projects involving design, equipment/fixture, location, software, regulatory, accounting, material sourcing, specification, process, documentation, and other changes to reduce waste/costs and improve/optimize throughput, efficiency, safety, quality, and customer experience.

work.title: Sales Manager and Salesman
work.description: Executed all ordering, inventory, sales, accounting, social media, scheduling, and delivery in  personal educational products sales business. 3,000+ hours of direct door-to-door sales experience. 13,000+ prospect calls and thousands of full sales cycles. Personal sales growth of $12,400 -> $34,600 -> $44,600. Attended 100+ hours of advanced sales and leadership training. Coached ethical selling techniques and motivated/led salespeople in the field. Immersive experience with a focus on success principles like goal setting, schedule, and attitude/emotional management. Relocated to Pennsylvania and Alabama for 3 summers.

work.title: Researcher
work.description: Designed, simulated, and optimized hardware solutions for nanoscale near-field radiative heat transfer research, primarily using SolidWorks. Awarded the Dee Foundation Scholar Designation for excellence in local and environmental research.

work.title: Tutor
work.description: Tutor students in a wide range of courses, from entry-level to upper-division college courses. Mostly mathematics and engineering courses, but also basic music, English, reading, etc.

resume.other_skills: Other skills I'm familiar with but would rate myself below 50% in include git, R, SQL, AWS, social media management, and React Native
